summary: A documentary on the hate crime assault and subsequent death of a Latino man in Shenandoah Pennsylvania, including the alleged cover-up and shocking court verdicts.
cast: Brian Scully|Julie Mickalowski|Ron Mickalowski|Danny Merva|Jenny Merva|Luis Ramirez|Crystal Dillman|Eileen Burke|Victor Garcia Cruz|Arielle Garcia|Jim Goodman|Gladys Limon|Joe Palubinsky|A.J. Serina|Derrick M. Donchak|Brandon J. Piekarsky|Colin J. Walsh|Frederick Fanelli|Tom O'Neill
title: Shenandoah
